dimensions: Warp x Weft: 12 x 40 cm (4 3/4 x 15 3/4 in.)
title: Fragment
medium:
Medium: linen warp, cotton weft
Technique: plain weave foundation.  Mordants for black and red block-printed.  Yellow and blue (combined for green) applied by brush.
description: Thorny rose stems and flowers on a picottage background. Black, red and green on white.
name: Fragment
